owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: An betting game with exotic bet types

Payout(uint256,address,uint256,uint256[].notice: emitted when a bet is cashed out.

Wagered(uint256,address,uint256,uint256[.notice: emitted when a new bet is placed on a race.

bet(address,uint256).notice: mapping of address to list of bets.

endRace(uint256,uint256[]).notice: End the race and set the result.

nextRaceId().notice: The time of the next race to take place.

odds(uint256,uint256[]).notice: Get the current odds for a prediction.

raceResult(uint256).notice: Return the results for a race.

start().notice: The datetime of the first race.

startRace(uint256).notice: Start the race and request result from VRF.

userBet(address,uint256).notice: Returns a users bet with given id.

userBetCount(address).notice: Return the amount of bets a user has made.
